#summary The Story So Far

= The Story So Far =

The PDF book publisher tool suite contains a number of tools, one of which ... the Book Publisher ... converts a folder conaining Open Office documents (ODT,ODP) into PDF docs.

The translation is handled by running [http://www.openoffice.org/ Open Office] or [http://www.libreoffice.org/ Libre Office] in "server mode" and uploading each file to the Open Office server using the [http://www.artofsolving.com/opensource/jodconverter/ JOD Converter API].

The Book Publisher also assembles the PDF docs into a 2-up PDF booklet using [http://itextpdf.com/ iText] with page numbers.
